pages.title: Coal Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/bees_hive/redstone)Blazing Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/bees_solitary/leafcutter)Leafcutter Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Obsidian Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/bees_wild/magmatic)Magmatic Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/bees_solitary/sweat)Sweat Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Diamond Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/bees_wild/ender)Ender Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/bees_hive/lapis)Lapis Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Emerald Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/bees_wild/slimy)Slimy Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/bees_hive/diamond)Diamond Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Netherite Bee
pages.text: Converted from a $(l:bees/bees_hive/diamond)Diamond Bee$(/l) be feeding it a block of netherite.

pages.title: Skeletal Bee
pages.text: Will move in to an advanced hive if the hive is left empty in the dark.

pages.title: Zombie Bee
pages.text: Will move in to an advanced hive if the hive is left empty in the dark.

pages.title: Creeper Bee
pages.text: Obtained by feeding a block of TNT to a vanilla bee.

pages.title: Blazing Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/bees_wild/magmatic)Magmatic Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/bees_solitary/nomad)Nomad Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Withered Bee
pages.text: Obtained by feeding a wither rose to a $(l:bees/bees_hive/skeletal)Skeletal Bee$(/l).
